signIn.title: Family Driver
signIn.subtitle: Sign in with your registered driver email to continue

verifyOtp.title: Enter Verification Code
verifyOtp.subtitle: We've sent a 6-digit code to
verifyOtp.helpText: Check your spam folder if you don't see the email

errors.signInFailedMessage: Could not send sign-in code. Please check your email and try again.
errors.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please contact your administrator.
errors.verificationFailedMessage: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
errors.failedToResendMessage: Could not resend the code. Please try again.
errors.otpSentMessage: A new sign-in code has been sent to your email.
errors.pendingApproval: Your account is pending verification. Please wait for admin approval.
errors.accountRejected: Your account has been rejected. Please contact support.
errors.accountSuspended: Your driver account has been suspended. Please contact support.
errors.notDriver: This app is for drivers only. Use a driver account.

onboarding.slide1Description: Request a ride in seconds. Enter your destination and we'll connect you with nearby drivers.
onboarding.slide2Description: Watch your driver arrive on the map. Know exactly when your ride will reach you.
onboarding.slide3Description: All drivers are verified and trained. Your safety is our top priority.
onboarding.slide4Description: Pay with cash or card. Transparent pricing with no hidden fees.

destination.title: Set Destination
destination.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one destination
destination.pinOnMapHint: Move the map to set a location

pickup.title: Set Pickup
pickup.instructionsPlaceholder: e.g. Wait at the red gate
pickup.photoHint: Add a photo to help the driver find you

bookTaxi.title: Book Taxi
bookTaxi.routeError: Could not find a route. Please try again.

explore.searchPlaceholder: Search for a place or address

rideRequest.title: New Ride Request
rideRequest.rideTakenMessage: Another driver has already accepted this ride.

activeRide.cancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this ride?
